snippet: The Department of Health and Human Services announced that it would provide $9 million over two years for lawyers to represent unaccompanied minors in their deportation cases.
abstract: Health and Human Services Dept announces that it will provide $9 million over two years for lawyers to represent unaccompanied minors in their deportation cases in immigration courts.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Health and Human Services announced that it would provide $9 million over two years for lawyers to represent unaccompanied minors in their deportation cases.
